name: PDFThumbnailView
desc: An object that contains a set of thumbnails, each of which represents a page in a PDF document.

items.name: var pdfView: PDFView?
items.desc: Returns the PDFView object associated with the thumbnail view.

items.name: var thumbnailSize: CGSize
items.desc: Returns the maximum width and height of the thumbnails in the thumbnail view.

items.name: var maximumNumberOfColumns: Int
items.desc: Returns the maximum number of columns of thumbnails the thumbnail view can display.

items.name: var labelFont: NSFont?
items.desc: Returns the font used to label the thumbnails.

items.name: var backgroundColor: UIColor?
items.desc: Returns the color used in the background of the thumbnail view.

items.name: var allowsDragging: Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether users can drag thumbnails (that is, re-order pages in the document) within the thumbnail view.

items.name: var allowsMultipleSelection: Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether users can select multiple thumbnails in the thumbnail view at one time.

items.name: var selectedPages: [PDFPage]?
items.desc: Returns an array of PDF pages that correspond to the selected thumbnails in the thumbnail view.
